humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the left breast cancer has 1 out of 2 tail of breast/low axillary lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma, and the right breast cancer has 2 out of 12 axillary lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage is N1 based on the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for a cancer patient is determined by the presence and extent of cancer in the lymph nodes. In this report, the left breast has one positive lymph node out of five examined (pN1a), and the right breast has two positive lymph nodes out of twelve examined (also pN1a). Since the N stage is based on the most advanced lymph node involvement, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N1.
